about_the_game:
As the lone explorer of New Earth, you find yourself on a mysterious yet familiar planet battling to stay alive and to learn everything you can to bring the rest of humanity home after the world as we knew it was sucked into a void nearly 300 years ago.

Build, explore, survive!

content_descriptors.notes: The content may not be appropriate for all ages. This game contains Blood, Gore, intense Violence and use of firearms.  There are dead bodies and some nudity. Has adult language, drug use and drug references.

detailed_description:
As the lone explorer of New Earth, you find yourself on a mysterious yet familiar planet battling to stay alive and to learn everything you can to bring the rest of humanity home after the world as we knew it was sucked into a void nearly 300 years ago.

Build, explore, survive!

name: Monstermörder Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 or FX6300
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX Gforce 1650S Radeon RX 470
  • Additional Notes: Recommended for Low/Medium settings This is the minimum currently tested, may support lower processors or graphics.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 Super
  • Additional Notes: Recommended for Epic settings

short_description: As the lone explorer of New Earth, you find yourself on a mysterious planet battling to stay alive and to learn everything you can to bring the rest of humanity home after the world as we knew it was sucked into a black hole nearly 300 years ago.
